text:
.minip
  :padding 5px
  :font-size 10px
  :opacity 0.8
  :filter alpha(opacity=80) 
  :background-repeat no-repeat
  
  .minip-inner
    :padding 4px 5px
    :max-width 200px
    :background-color #000
    :color #fff
  
  .minip-north
    :background url(images/north.gif) top center

  .minip-east
    :background url(images/east.gif) right center

  .minip-south
    :background url(images/south.gif) bottom center

  .minip-west
    :background url(images/west.gif) left center
